item.title: AWS takeover through SSRF in JavaScript
item.description: Here is the story of a bug I found in a private bug bounty program on Hackerone. It took me exactly 12h30 -no break- to find it, exploit and report. I was able to dump the AWS credentials, this lead me to fully compromise the account of the company: 20 buckets and 80 EC2 instances (Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud) in my hands. Besides the fact that it’s one of my best bug in my hunter career, I also learnt alot during this sprint, so let’s share!
